headline: Equifax Canada Introduces Optimal Path™, an Interactive Solution to Empower Financial Well-Being
summary: New tool gives lenders the opportunity to help their customers reach their credit score goalsTORONTO, Sept. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Equifax® Canada introduces Optimal Path™, an interactive solution that uses an individual’s credit data to create personalized, actionable suggestions to help Canadians in building a better credit future.
